text: Hagi Zerubabeli'ene Nehemaiakema mani'na'a knafina, mago mago zupa Israeli vahe'mo'za zamazankakuti ne'zana eri'za zagamema hu vahe'ene mono nonkafante'ma kvama hu vahera eme zamitere hu'naze. Ana hazage'za ana ne'zantamina Livae naga'moza refko hu'neza, Aroni naga'ma pristi eri'zama eneriza vahera zami'naze.
